newsitem.title: SYRIA: Islamic states condemn Israeli settlement policy.
newsitem.headline: Islamic states condemn Israeli settlement policy.

text.p: Information ministers and envoys of nine Arab and Islamic states on Sunday strongly condemned the settlement polcies of Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu and his refusal to swap occupied Arab lands for peace.

"The ministerial follow up committee expresses its condemnation and denounciation of Israel's settlement policy and its brutal practices against Arabs and calls on the Islamic media and the world community to expose these practices..," a statement issued by the ministers said.

The ministers and envoys of Syria, Egypt, Saudi Arabia, Oman, Kuwait, Tunisia, the Palestinian Authority, Malaysia and Senegal met in Damascus at the weekend to discuss boosting cooperation among members of the Islamic Conference Organization.
Netanyahu has angered Arab and Islamic states by ending a freeze on the building of settlement in the West Bank that was imposed by the previous Labour-led government he defeated in May elections.
